Interface: ReplicatedEntityCommandContext

akkaserverless.replicatedentity. ReplicatedEntityCommandContext

Context for a Replicated Entity command handler.

Extends

  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.StateManagementContext
  • module:akkaserverless.CommandContext
  • module:akkaserverless.EntityContext

Members

onStateChange :module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext~onStateChangeCallback

Set a callback for handling state change events.

This may only be invoked on streamed commands. If invoked on a non streamed command, it will throw an error.

This will be invoked every time the state of this Replicated Entity changes, allowing the callback to send messages to the stream.

Type:
  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext~onStateChangeCallback

onStreamCancel :module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext~onStreamCancelCallback

Set a callback for handling the stream cancelled event.

This may only be invoked on streamed commands. If invoked on a non streamed command, it will throw an error.

This will be invoked if the client initiated a cancel, it will not be invoked if the stream was ended by invoking module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.StateChangedContext#end.

Type:
  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext~onStreamCancelCallback

state :module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedData

The Replicated Data state for a Replicated Entity. It may only be set once, if it's already set, an error will be thrown.

Type:
  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedData
Inherited From:
  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.StateManagementContext#state

<readonly> streamed :boolean

Whether this command is streamed or not.

Type:
  • boolean

writeConsistency :module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.WriteConsistency

Set the write consistency for replication of Replicated Entity state.

Type:
  • module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.WriteConsistency

delete()

Delete this Replicated Entity.

effect(method, message, synchronous, metadata)

DEPRECATED. Emit an effect after processing this command.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
method

The entity service method to invoke.
message object

The message to send to that service.
synchronous boolean

Whether the effect should be execute synchronously or not.
metadata module:akkaserverless.Metadata

Metadata to send with the effect.
Inherited From:
  • module:akkaserverless.EffectContext#effect

fail(msg)

Fail handling this command.

An alternative to using this is to return a failed Reply created with 'ReplyFactory.failed'.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
msg

The failure message.
Inherited From:
  • module:akkaserverless.EffectContext#fail
Throws:

An error that captures the failure message. Note that even if you catch the error thrown by this method, the command will still be failed with the given message.

forward(method, message, metadata)

DEPRECATED. Forward this command to another service component call, use 'ReplyFactory.forward' instead.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
method

The service component method to invoke.
message object

The message to send to that service component.
metadata module:akkaserverless.Metadata

Metadata to send with the forward.
Inherited From:
  • module:akkaserverless.CommandContext#forward

thenForward(method, message, metadata)

DEPRECATED. Forward this command to another service component call.

Parameters:
Name Type Description

The service component method to invoke.
message object

metadata module:akkaserverless.Metadata

Inherited From:
  • module:akkaserverless.CommandContext#thenForward
Deprecated:
  • Since version 0.7. Will be deleted in version 0.8. Use 'forward' instead.

Type Definitions

onStateChangeCallback(state, context)

Callback for handling module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext#onStateChange events for a Replicated Entity, specific to a given streamed connection.

The callback may not modify the Replicated Entity state, doing so will cause an error.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
state module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedData

The current Replicated Data state that has changed
context module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.StateChangedContext

The context for the state change.
Returns:

If an object is returned, that will be sent as a message to the current streamed call. It must be an object that conforms to this streamed commands output type.

Type
undefined | object

onStreamCancelCallback(state, context)

Callback for handling module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedEntityCommandContext#onStreamCancel events for a Replicated Entity, specific to a given streamed connection.

The callback may modify the Replicated Entity state if it pleases.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
state module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.ReplicatedData

The current Replicated Data state that has changed
context module:akkaserverless.replicatedentity.StreamCancelledContext

The context for the stream cancellation.
